text: The 1981 Campeonato Nacional was Chilean league top tier’s 49th season. Colo- Colo was the tournament’s champion, winning its thirteenth title. ==League table== ==Results== == Topscorers == {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%; text-align:center;" |- !width="205"|Name !width="205"|Team !width="50"|Goals |- || Carlos Caszely||Colo-Colo||20 |- || Luis Marcoleta||Magallanes||20 |- || Víctor Cabrera||San Luis||20 |} ==Liguilla Pre-Copa Libertadores== \---- \---- ==Promotion/relegation Liguilla== == See also == * 1981 Copa Polla Gol == References == == External links == *ANFP *RSSSF Chile 1981 Category:Primera División de Chile seasons Chile Prim
title: 1981 Primera División de Chile
